preconditions.precondition: IncreasingOrder and DecreasingOrder classes must be created.
Scanner and Switch objects must be initialized.

mainSequence.step: User initializes the scanner for looping.
Scanner sends a message to the user.
User inputs data into the scanner.
Switch redirects to IncreasingOrder or DecreasingOrder based on input.
SortingTemplate processes the data using the Template Method pattern.
SortingTemplate sorts data in increasing or decreasing order using respective methods.
